title: Password rules
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Sign Up Page
custom_steps: WHEN the user is creating a password
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the following password requirements and must make a password fitting the following password requirements:
 - No special characters
 - One number
 - One uppercase letter
 - One lowercase letter
 - 8-15 characters

title: First time registration
custom_preconds: App is installed and the user has not registered

custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. the loading page is displayed
2. Log in/Sign up page is displayed

Things are displayed: 

1. Text: "Create an MLB.com account to play the game and get access to exclusive MLB content."
2. Email, Nickname, Password, Birthday fields are displayed
3. Sign Up button 
4. Text: "Already have an account? Log In"

Boilerplate agreement displayed at bottom, containing links to:
- Official Rules
- Terms of Use

And the following privacy policies:
- MLB
- MGM Resorts
- BetMGM

custom_steps_separated.content: Tap on all 5 links and navigate back to app
custom_steps_separated.expected: Each link navigate to the appropriate page

custom_steps_separated.content:
Enter bad info into fields, i.e.:
1. invalid email
2. profanity in the nickname
3. password does not include a caps letter or a number

custom_steps_separated.expected:
Things are displayed: 

1. Text: "Log in to your MLB.com account to play the game and get access to exclusive MLB content."
2. Email and Password  fields are displayed
3. "Forgot Your Password?"
4. Log In button
5. Text: "Don't have an account? Sign Up"
Sign up page is displayed. No previously entered info retains
Favorite team selection page is displayed

1. Team color is the highlight color
2. Logos and team names are readable and are of uniform size and quality
Welcome page is displayed, with the same boilerplate agreement and links as listed in step 2.

custom_steps_separated.content: Tap on all 5 links and navigate back to app
custom_steps_separated.expected: Each link navigate to the appropriate page

custom_steps_separated.content: Open the app and tap on sign up
custom_steps_separated.expected: The sign up page is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: Fill out form the user needs to be 20 years of age with a birthday of tomorrow
custom_steps_separated.expected: A message is displayed stating pay out is not available for users under the age of 21.

1. The user is displayed in both leaderboards
2. No indication of payout is shown

custom_steps_separated.content: Log back in the next day.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. Payout indications are now shown for the user.
2. betMGM branding is displayed

title: Swipe-to-Type Entry
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has selected a text entry field
custom_steps: WHEN a user alternately uses swiping and tapping to enter text
custom_expected: THEN the app should enter the text as expected and should not crash

title: Favorite team page
custom_expected:
1. Team color is the highlight color
2. Selected team has a blue border
3. All teams have logos
4. Teams are displayed in 3 columns 
5. The "Next" button is disabled until a user chooses a favorite team

title: Email field negative testing
custom_expected:
1. When user creates a profile with an existing email -	Message 'An account with that email already exists' is displayed
2. When user tries to login with an invalid email - A "..." error message is displayed and the email text box is turned red.

title: Log in with incorrect email/password
custom_expected: 'Please enter a valid email/password' error message is displayed.
